### Description
We are trying to build ocaml based software CCA/EBT(https://github.com/ebt-hpc/cca) in Spack.
CCA/EBT needs `ocamlfind` to build.
https://opam.ocaml.org/packages/ocamlfind/
`ocamlfind` works same as `pip`. `ocamlfind` must be installed in `ocaml` directory and
`ocamlfind` make library files under `ocaml`.
This behavior seems to conflict Spack management system.
Should we import `ocamlfind` buildsystem in Spack as pip?
I don't know about ocaml itself. This import seems very difficult.

### General information

- [ ] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: ocaml package manager and spack
